title: gander
description: a flock of geese settled at the pond in front of the UMass library during autumn. i think they might be chilling.

title: forest flow
description: you could say this approximates impressionism, but to be completely honest i never really studied that stuff super in-depth. colors somewhat inspired from fauvism.

title: self-portrait
description: to live is to hunger. to hunger is to live. to achieve nourishment, there must first be decay.

title: bloodwalk
description: drawing with this program is really fun, gives you a whole ton of options for paint texture. btw, not based on a true story.

title: mr. j
description: a study of one of my favorite internet cats. look up straycatj, you will not be disappointed.

title: herobrine
description: the absolute hold this image had on me when i was a kid. if you know, you know.
